coreAttributes.clothingAuthorTag: The tag you got with the package reads 'From TGV, with love <3'
coreAttributes.name: scrotum ring piercings
coreAttributes.description: A pack of ring piercings, each with an unscrewable sphere on them that can be slid into place through multiple scrotum piercings.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] the set of bar piercings into [npc.her] pierced [npc.cock].
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] the set of bar piercings into [npc2.namePos] [npc2.cock].
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] the set of bar piercings into [npc2.namePos] [npc2.cock], giving them a rough tug.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] the set of bar piercings out of [npc.her] [npc.cock].
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] the set of bar piercings out of [npc2.namePos] [npc2.cock].
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(tug)] [npc2.NamePos] bar piercings before sliding them out.
